WRITING.TITLE: A Payer for Special Needs.
WRITING.TEXT:
A preacher said, "Anyone with 'special needs' who wants to be prayed over, please come forward to the front by the altar."
With that, Leroy got in line and when it was his turn, the Preacher asked, "Leroy, what do you want me to pray about for you?"
Leroy replied, "Preacher, I need you to pray for help with my hearing." The preacher put one finger of one hand in Leroy's ear, placed his other hand on top of Leroy's head and then prayed and prayed and prayed. He prayed a "blue streak" for Leroy and the whole congregation joined in with great enthusiasm.
After a few minutes, the preacher removed his hands, stood back and asked, "Leroy, how is your hearing now?" Leroy answered, "I don't know. It ain't 'til next week."
So old.
Then he/she sets it on fire.

WRITING.TITLE: Why are so many Italians named Tony?
WRITING.TEXT: Because when they immigrated from Italy, customs stuck a label on their lapel reading ToN.Y.
http://www.limestonecreamery.ca/

Where I live a new dairy co. which produces organic dairy products has delivery and it is proven to be very successful. They delivery to your door with glass bottled milk once a week. It now owns 6 trucks and it has really taken off. I am not a customer, but many people here are. Here is the link: http://www.limestonecreamery.ca/
This would be the far side of the moon. Right? The side we never see.

If you know one of your Bud's got thrown out of a strip club, you never ask his wife "So how was Hubby when he got home from being thrown out of the strip club?" My "friend" actually asked my wife at the bowling alley about that night, about three weeks later. I never spoke with him after that. I kinda regret that now, because he does a couple of years later. Rules are rules.

WRITING.TITLE: One hot summer day, a blonde came to town with her dog
WRITING.TEXT:
One hot summer day, a blonde came to town with her dog, tied it under the shade of a tree, and headed into a restaurant for something cold to drink. Twenty minutes later, a policeman entered the restaurant and asked, 'Who owns the dog tied under that tree outside?
The blonde said it was hers. 'Your dog seems to be in heat' the officer said.
The blonde replied, 'No way. She's cool 'cause she's tied up under that shade tree.
The policeman said, 'No! You don't understand. Your dog needs to be bred.
'No way,' said the blonde. 'My dog doesn't need bread. She isn't hungry 'cause I fed her this morning.
The exasperated policeman said, 'NO! You don't understand. Your dog wants to have sex!
(You have to love this)
The blonde looked at the cop and said, 'Well, go ahead. I always wanted a police dog.
The question was, if you knew more people whose lives were ruined as a result of WOW. I answered that I do. I, personally, do not know of any lives that were ruined because of smoking pot.
Most of my friends are "stoners" and we don't piss and shit in a bucket so we can just sit there and get stoned. We all work and have pay checks. None have lost their marriage because of pot.
I think this is true. I know someone who had a piss and shit pot next to him while he played and stopped working. Needless to say his wife left him.

I would rather have her living at my home with a partner or even bringing them home, if even just for a one night stand. This way I know if he is abusing my daughter in any way. If she's happy and he seems like a good guy, I really don't give a shit who she has sex with.
Good way if you want to get shot.

WRITING.TITLE: Its Official, Ladies Not Shaving Their Armpits Is Becoming A Trend

WRITING.TEXT: I worked with a few Germans in the 70's who fought against us in WWII and it was so uncomfortable standing next to them during Remembrance Day Ceremonies. They just did as all of did, bowed and stood in silence for 2 min. It was so awkward, because Canadian vets were also present. The Vets sort of stayed in their own group. This post just reminded me of that experience.
Mutual Assured Self Destruction during the cold war.
